events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund because it is not what I purchased.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the product not matching the order.
Your case has been assigned to our customer service representative who will assist you further.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund for the incorrect product, and I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
My order number is 123456789. I have attached a picture showing that the item is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund immediately and provide a prepaid label for you to return the wrong item.
I appreciate your quick response and refund offer. Thank you for resolving this issue promptly.
The refund has been processed, and return instructions sent. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and everything is settled with your order. Feel free to reach out for any more help.
Since your refund was completed successfully and you’ve confirmed everything is fine, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us!
